titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Francis E. Ross papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Resident of Grand Cayman Island, British West Indies, later Roscommon, Michigan; student at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Student expense book, 1915-1916; copies of reports to family and friends describing his trips to Central America in 1966-1969 to photograph pre-Columbian monuments and architecture for Princeton University; and report of visit in 1970 to Quaker settlement in northwestern Costa Rica.
